title: List of fictional big cats in animation
data: The Jungle Book The Jungle Book

Black leopard - a clever , serious and responsible character , quite similar to the Bagheera in the novel , except that in the novel Bagheera spoiled Mowgli more . In the film , it is Bagheera and not the wolves who first finds Mowgli , a young village child and he is the one who takes him back to the village
A vicious leopard , who killed Kala 's son , along with Tarzan 's parents , but was killed by an adult Tarzan

A cream African leopard who tracks Ajabu an Okapi to the Pride Lands . He is also the leader of his clan of the back lands . Makucha meansClaws in the Swahili language and is voiced by Steve Blum . He became the main antagonist in Season 3
An African leopard who is a victim to Mapigano . He eventually overcomes his fear by standing up for himself
An African leopard who bullied Badilli upon his territory
A Snow Leopard who is the main antagonist who tries to snatch the dragon scroll from Shifu
A snow leopard who frightens the red pandas . After being defeated by Bunga , she joins forces with Makucha to visit the Tree of Life
A leopard born blind in one eye who is the main antagonist and plans to kill Khumba
A Clouded Leopard and the main antagonist . Voiced by Chrissie Hynde
A Clouded Leopard that the Lion Guard encountered in the forest during their journey to the Tree of Life
A leopard cub who lost his father Sultan
